description: Extracts list of letters and envelopes attached to Customer Service (NCS) communication.

columns.name: COMM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the customer service communication.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LTR_HNO_ID
columns.description: The ID of the note record that stores the text of the letter or envelope.

columns.name: LTR_ETX_ID
columns.description: The ID of the SmartText template record for the letter or envelope.

columns.name: LTR_ETX_ID_SMARTTEXT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the SmartText record.

columns.name: LTR_SUMMARY
columns.description: This column contains the first 254 characters of the letter or envelope associated with the customer service communication.

columns.name: LTR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the letter or envelope template.

columns.name: LTR_CREATE_DATE
columns.description: The date the letter or envelope was added to the customer service communication.

columns.name: LTR_CREATE_TIME
columns.description: The time the letter or envelope was added to the customer service communication.

columns.name: LTR_USER_ID
columns.description: The ID of the user who created the letter or envelope in the customer service communication.
